headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Treasure Chests and Hidden Caches
content:
Combing the tropical terrain on Cayo Perico and the ocean floor — from sea to shining sea — in search of Treasure Chests and Hidden Caches will yield double the usual GTA$ & RP to all treasure-hunters.

The decommissioned Kosatka submarine is 25% off, as are all of its possible customization options, giving you the perfect opportunity to visit the sunny shores of El Rubio’s island stronghold and the murky depths of the ocean blue for yourself.
